title: UDL-Based Secondary STEM Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Science Education Competency Enhancement Program for Office/Administrative Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply UDL's three principles (representation, action/expression, engagement) to middle school STEM lesson design
Learners can propose ≥2 multimodal representation strategies when designing STEM activities that consider diverse learner needs
Learners can create science lab guidelines reflecting UDL principles in BYOD environments

resources: Public STEM Online Database Access Permissions
Digital content creation tools (Canva, H5P, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
